item.description:
ATMC Presents: "Globalizing Your Business" by Toby Stapleton

When: Wednesday, March 14, 2012, 12:00-1:30 p.m.
Where: ATMC, 151 Martine Street, Fall River, MA, 02723

In this session you will learn how to:
Create a customized international marketing campaign
Identify and evaluate foreign business partners
Evaluate whether or not you need an export license for your product

To RSVP for this FREE event, please contact Amit Basnet, abasnet@umassd.edu or (508) 910-9872
item.name: ATMC Presents: "Globalizing Your Business" by Toby Stapleton
